incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: Dropbox desktop application may not be working as expected

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

The problem has been identified as occurring when launching the Dropbox Desktop app without network connectivity. For most users, restarting the desktop app after connecting to a network should resolve the issue.
Dropbox desktop application may not be starting up as expected for some users. We are working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.

incident_updates.body: Our team has identified that this only affects Samsung users with Android 13 and they have implemented a fix to resolve the issue.

incidents.name: Intermittent issues with file upload and download

incident_updates.body: Users may have experienced intermittent errors with file upload and download that lasted for about 30 minutes (5:00 - 5:30 UTC). The issue has been identified and resolved.
